short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Recent Mistakes, Extra Study, WaniKani Community, and the clear buttons at the bottom of the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes "Recent Mistakes", "Extra Study", "WaniKani Community", and the clear buttons at the bottom of WaniKani's dashboard.
